example.name: autogen1
example.text: Small wonder that Britain 's Labor Party wants credit controls .
example.arg: that Britain 's Labor Party wants credit controls

example.name: autogen2
example.text: No wonder all kinds of big-time scams have flourished here , from phony tax-sheltered Bible sales to crooked car dealers to bogus penny-stock traders
